response.original_title: The Blood Street - Challenge to the System
response.overview: Disgruntled bureaucracy and brutal police converted the whole of Punjab into a virtual The Blood Street which threatened the very existence of common man.Few of them decided to flush out the bad elements of the police force and put forth the inhuman treatment meted out to common man by the police in connivance with bureaucracy of the time.
response.title: The Blood Street - Challenge to the System
